Uses of Package
com.github.hanyaeger.core.entities.motion

Packages that use com.github.hanyaeger.core.entities.motion
Package
Description
com.github.hanyaeger.api.entities
Classes, Interfaces and Packages that are related to Entities and their behaviour.
com.github.hanyaeger.api.entities.impl.circle
The Circle Entity in its static and dynamic version.
com.github.hanyaeger.api.entities.impl.ellipse
The Ellipse Entity in its static and dynamic version.
com.github.hanyaeger.api.entities.impl.rectangle
The Rectangle Entity in its static and dynamic version.
com.github.hanyaeger.api.entities.impl.sprite
The Sprite Entity in its static and dynamic version.
com.github.hanyaeger.api.entities.impl.text
The Text Entity in its static and dynamic version.
com.github.hanyaeger.core.entities.motion
 
  • Classes in com.github.hanyaeger.core.entities.motion used by com.github.hanyaeger.api.entities
    Class
    Description
    BufferedMovable
    A BufferedMovable extends the interface Movable and support the use of a buffer.
    DirectionProvider
    A DirectionProvider exposes a method to acquire the direction.
    EntityMotionInitBuffer
    An EntityMotionInitBuffer is used to support the option to set the speed, direction and physics related properties of an YaegerEntity from the constructor.
    MotionApplier
    A MotionApplier provides basis behaviour regarding speed and direction of a YaegerEntity
    MotionModifier
    A MotionModifier is the basic interface that defines the API of all Objects that capable of modifying the motion of a YaegerEntity.
    Movable
    When the Interface Movable is implemented, an YaegerEntity is able to move around the YaegerScene on each Game World Update.
    NewtonianModifier
    A NewtonianModifier is capable of modifying all properties that are related to the laws of gravity and friction.
    RotationBuffer
    A RotationBuffer is a simple data container, only used for storing the value of rotate, in case it is set before a Node is available.
    SpeedProvider
    A SpeedProvider exposes a method to acquire the speed.
